results.name: FREDDY: A NIGHTMARE ON ELM STREET

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 8
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 800 series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x9
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x9

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 770 or AMD Equivalent (Shader Model 5.0 Support)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 11+ or Vulkan support required
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 or AMD Equivalent (Shader Model 5.0 Support)
  • DirectX: Version 12
